casebody.data:
Overton et al., Appellants, v. Western Reserve Group, Appellee.

[Cite as Overton v. W. Res. Group (2001), 91 Ohio St.3d 333.]

(No. 00-277 Submitted March 28, 2001 Decided April 11, 2001.) Boyk, McCulley & Crossmock and Steven L. Crossmock; and David G. Lake, for appellants.

The judgment of the court of appeals is affirmed on the authority of Davidson v. Motorists Mut. Ins. Co. (2001), 91 Ohio St.3d 262, 744 N.E.2d 713.

Moyer, C.J., Resnick, F.E. Sweeney, Pfeifer, Cook and Lundberg Stratton, JJ., concur. Douglas, J., dissents.
